actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the programs of the National Bureau of Standards, including certain special statutory programs, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Bureau of Standards Authorizations of Appropriations Act for Fiscal Years 1981 and 1982

summary.text: National Bureau of Standards Authorizations of Appropriations Act for Fiscal Years 1981 and 1982 - Authorizes appropriations for fiscal years 1981 and 1982 to the Secretary of Commerce for: (1) activities of the National Bureau of Standards under the Act of March 3, 1901 and other statutes; (2) facilities improvement; (3) international activities; and (4) activities performed for other agencies.

titles.title: National Bureau of Standards Authorizations of Appropriations Act for Fiscal Years 1981 and 1982
A bill to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the programs of the National Bureau of Standards, including certain special statutory programs, and for other purposes.
